transcript: And they all, all as one, turn as one, and form this line as big as the caliphon your coast and start swimming this way, swimming as if that's the only thing that matters.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And they all, all as one, turned as one and formed this line as big as the California coast and started swimming this way. Swimming as if that's the only thing that matters.
